item_definitions.name: Rusty Dagger
item_definitions.description: A simple, pitted dagger. It's not much, but it's sharp enough.

item_definitions.name: Health Potion
item_definitions.description: A vial of swirling red liquid that restores a small amount of health.

areas.name: The Ancient Oak Meadow
areas.description: An ancient oak dominates the hillside, its twisted trunk rising from the earth in massive coils. The tree's vast canopy spreads across the sky, its leaves catching rays of sunlight that pierce through gathering storm clouds above. The meadow blooms with blue cornflowers and crimson poppies dotting the emerald grass.

areas.name: The Whispering Grove
areas.description: A dense grove of ancient trees stands before you, their branches intertwined like the fingers of old friends. The air is thick with the scent of pine and earth, and a gentle breeze carries whispers through the leaves. Sunlight filters through the canopy in golden shafts, illuminating patches of moss-covered ground where small flowers bloom in the shadows.

areas.name: The Eastern Road
areas.description: A dusty road stretches eastward from the Ancient Oak Meadow, flanked by swaying grasses and scattered wildflowers. Wagon ruts and footprints hint at travelers who have passed this way.

areas.name: The Drunken Oak Tavern Entrance
areas.description: A cozy tavern built from reclaimed timber, its windows glowing with warm candlelight. The scent of roasted meats and fresh bread drifts from within, inviting weary travelers.

areas.name: The Drunken Oak Tavern
areas.description: Wooden beams arch overhead, and the air is thick with the mingled aromas of ale, roasted meats, and pipe smoke. A roaring hearth casts flickering light across long tables, where patrons laugh and share tales of adventure.

areas.name: Blacksmith's Hut
areas.description: The clang of hammer on anvil resonates from this sturdy stone hut. Sparks dance in the air as the blacksmith shapes glowing metal into tools and weapons.

lore_card_templates.default_description: This card represents the unyielding spirit with which you were born.
